content.description:
SKINNY LEGS AND ALL 5.10c *** (60') M (5b)

A stellar route up the middle of the face with sustained, consistently interesting climbing and route finding on great rock with good rests and clips. 2 bolt cold shut anchors are over the lip (better to rap than lower). A couple of medium to small cams are essential for protecting the middle section.
content.protection: Mixed - 5 bolts, plus a couple of medium to small cams are needed.
content.location: In the middle of the Roadside cliff, belay from the edge of the road....

content.description:
Jitterbug Perfume 5.10a ** (55') M(5b)

Climb the left side of the face beginning in the shallow left leaning corner behind the dead willow. Sustained and interesting climbing to the two cold shut anchors on the lip. Medium to small cams needed.
content.protection: Mixed - 5 bolts and few small to medium cams.
content.location: Left side of the small roadside cliff.

content.description:
Another Roadside Attraction - 5.11a * (60') F/M(5b)

The steep face left of the overhangs, beginning just off the road. Consistent, varied climbing on interesting rock with tricky sequences. You may want a medium sized cam for the large crack after the crux and smaller nuts for the top 15' of 4th class scramble. 2 widely spaced bolts are set way back over the top for anchors.
content.protection: Fixed - 5 bolts, but you may want a medium sized cam for the large crack after the crux and smaller nuts for the top 15' of 4th class scramble. 2 widely spaced bolts are set way back over the top for anchors.
content.location: Along the road on the right side where the cliff almost touches the road.
